description: This file defines a React functional component named CodeEditor that wraps the 'react-simple-code-editor' with syntax highlighting using PrismJS, allowing editing code snippets with theme support.

methods.name: CodeEditor
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a code editor with syntax highlighting and theme support, forwarding refs.
